document_data.name: Bugthimble
document_data.mainbody:
'''Bugthimble''' was a grave robbing [[kobold]] in the city of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{quote|''<nowiki>'</nowiki>ere! Whatcha doing? Get them sausage fingers off my crate!''|Bugthimble}}
document_data.Description: Bugthimble was a kobold with pale orange scales and makeshift armor made of leather, horns, and fangs.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Bugthimble led a small gang of kobold gave robbers to dig around the graves and coffins of the [[Lower City Graveyard]] of Baldur's Gate, including [[Antunio Bongle]]'s final resting place. Bugthimble operated outside of the other criminal organizations of the Gate and was intimidated by [[the Guild]] and its notorious leader, [[Nine-Fingers Keene]].
